mapper.select: select c.id as id ,c.user_id as user_id ,c.product_id as product_id ,c.rating as rating ,c.comment as comment ,u.name as userName from t_comment c join t_user u on c.user_id = u.id where product_id = #{productId} order by c.id asc;
mapper.insert: insert into t_comment (user_id, product_id, rating, comment) values (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{rating}, #{comment})
mapper.update: update t_comment set user_id = #{userId}, product_id = #{productId}, rating = #{rating}, comment = #{comment} where id = #{id}
